categories: Category:Star Wars: Forces of Destiny: Daring Adventures

nodes.text: Forces of Destiny: The Leia Chronicles

Forces of Destiny: The Leia Chronicles is the third chapter book of the Forces of Destiny: Daring Adventures series based on the animated micro-series Star Wars: Forces of Destiny, which adapt select episodes of the animated micro-series, while adding scenes and dialogue not originally present. It was released on January 2, 2018.
The choices we make, the actions we take, the moments-both big and small-shape us into FORCES OF DESTINY!
This chapter book, based on the all-new animated micro-series spotlighting some of Star Wars' greatest heroes, features three exciting stories about rebel leader, Princess Leia!
The book adapts three episodes of the micro-series Star Wars: Forces of Destiny: Ewok Escape, An Imperial Feast, and Bounty of Trouble, with additional scenes and introductions by Maz Kanata.
